identity.name: thecommons. Growth OS
core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Poster aesthetics with SaaS density.
Content is King: Data is the art. No decoration.
Contrast: Extreme Black & White. No greys in the middle.

rules: Use texture (noise) instead of color for depth.
Primary action buttons must be White with Black text (Inverse).
Borders are critical for separation in a monochrome UI.

buttons.primary: bg-white text-black hover:bg-zinc-200 rounded-full px-8 font-medium transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-zinc-800 text-white hover:bg-zinc-900 rounded-full px-8

cards.style: bg-black border border-zinc-800 p-6 relative overflow-hidden group

inputs.style: bg-black border border-zinc-800 focus:border-white focus:ring-0 rounded-none h-12 px-4 text-white placeholder:text-zinc-600

navigation.sidebar: bg-black border-r border-zinc-800 w-64 hidden md:flex flex-col

textures: Grain overlay: opacity-5 pointer-events-none fixed inset-0 z-50 bg-[url('https://grainy-gradients.vercel.app/noise.svg')]
effects: Tracing Beam: Animated border on active cards.
Scanlines: Subtle repeating linear gradient for 'Terminal' sections.

assets.icons: Lucide React (Default) or Phosphor Icons (for thinner weights)

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME SETUP: Update `tailwind.config.js` and `index.css` immediately to enforce the Monochrome palette. Remove all default Shadcn 'slate/blue' tints. Use pure Zinc/Neutral scales.
2. FONT INSTALLATION: Add 'Manrope' and 'JetBrains Mono' via Google Fonts in `index.html` or CSS import.
3. LAYOUT: Implement the 'Command Center' using the Bento Grid strategy defined in the design system.
4. COMPONENTS: Customize all Shadcn components to remove 'rounded-md' and replace with 'rounded-sm' or 'rounded-none' for a sharper, Swiss look.
5. CHARTS: When implementing Recharts, use the `chart_palette` defined above. Do not use random colors.
6. CLIENT PORTAL: This must be visually distinct. Use MORE whitespace and larger typography than the internal dashboard.
7. IMAGES: Use the provided texture images for empty states or card backgrounds in the 'Creative OS' section.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for floating navs.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
